QuestData.Title: Deceit
QuestData.Description: What? Why're you still here? Oh, did I promise that I'd help you and the Thorium Brotherhood in yer fight?$b$bI lied.$b$bI just can't spare the men right now. I know I said I'd help, but there's absolutely no way you can convince me to leave Iron Summit right now. Absolutely no way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a way to convince Mountain-Lord Rendan to join the Thorium Brotherhood.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lunk at Iron Summit in Searing Gorge.
QuestData.RewardText: Well well well. Look who come searching for Lunk this time!$b$bThis sounds like case for Lunk's unique brand of no-kill problem-solve.
